entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this morning then rising. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
